title: I got hacked and I don't know if I can prove I'm the owner
body: what information is nessecary for them to Believe it's my account? please reply someone <3

replies.body: Yet again, if those questions were asked to the player when he tries to change either the password or the email address, this wouldnt happen, because if the owners cant validate their ownership, how can a hacker validate it? If he cant validate, he cant change the password, if he cant change the password, the owner wont get hacked, and if the player doesnt get hacked, this post and those tickets and wasted time wouldnt happen? Maybe there is something else to secure our accounts RIOT can do.

They'll offer a list of varying questions, but really it's to help you.  Meaning, any information you can provide helps immensely.  You can also use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to help prepare for the recovery process.  Good luck!
